user.title: ELRO Connects Real-time Hub Setup
user.description: Configure your ELRO Connects hub connection for real-time events. You can find the Device ID by checking your ELRO Connects app or hub settings.

data_description.host: The IP address of your ELRO Connects hub on your local network
data_description.device_id: The unique device identifier of your ELRO Connects hub, usually starts with 'ST_'
data_description.ctrl_key: Control key for authentication (leave default unless specified)
data_description.app_id: Application ID for authentication (leave default unless specified)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the ELRO Connects hub. Please verify the IP address and ensure the hub is powered on and connected to your network.

abort.already_configured: This ELRO Connects hub is already configured.
